entry.title: Bourbon Neat-Variables
entry.content:
In this last section about Bourbon Neat we’ll look at the various “built in” Sass variables you have at your disposal. It’s gonna be a short ride but being able to tweak your grids is important to know.

Variables

  • default-layout-direction
  • visual-grid-opacity
  • border-box-sizing
  • visual-grid-index
  • disable-warnings
  • visual-grid-color
  • default-feature
  • grid-columns
  • max-width
  • visual-grid
  • column
  • gutter

Visualizing your grid

Let’s start with something that you should be using from day one. Neat can show you a visual grid that makes it easier to see how you wanna compose your layout.

  • visual-grid
